puzzle.def: a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge

bug.def: an insect of a large order distinguished by having mouthparts that are modified for piercing and sucking

soft.def: easy to mold, cut, compress, or fold; not hard or firm to the touch

test.def: a procedure intended to establish the quality, performance, or reliability of something, especially before it is taken into widespread use
